title: ITextAndCustomProperty.IsCustomProperty
description: Gets whether this is text or a custom property in a theme for a SOLIDWORKS MBD 3D PDF.
returns: True if a custom property, false if text
remarks:
This property corresponds to a
Text Field
or
Custom Property Field
group box in a theme.
